content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5), burner inserter at position(x=3.5, y=0.5), chest at position(x=2.5, y=0.5) and small electric pole at position(x=2.5, y=1.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
-  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the pipe connection points are correctly aligned before attempting to connect
- Make sure that the fluid system is not full before attempting to connect pipes
### Errors when refueling entities
- Ensure that the entity is out of fuel before attempting to refuel
- Make sure that the fuel is available in the inventory before attempting to refuel
### Errors when using burner mining drills
- Ensure that the burner mining drill has fuel before attempting to mine
- Make sure that the resources are available before attempting to mine
